title: How good and reliable are Johnson electric guitars? - Quora

response.answer_text: They are student-grade instruments, perhaps suitable (when properly set-up by a professional) for the first year of lessons. I would place them one step up from the Walmart/Sams Club/Target ‘First Act’ models.
never heard of them, and I have been playing a LONG time and have too many guitars. Point being, that is not a good sign.
